topic.title: Warez collection
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/15WekZHWESPLaShVxyPYUBnxt4MBvuHyyT/

I will try to keep this updated. Movies/TV/Film/Ebooks. 

If you have any  requests just type it here.

1613068421_1Knfo3Xr91jYnAA1idYY9Ce8TDk41.body: Also I wonder, if someone download from here will they become seeders?

> [bats](#comment_70_1QvU5RXqw5mjgR3BZV5rkc2ju6NHXpGnp): Unless they actively delete the file, they will seed it for a while at least. It's possible to pin a file in order to seed indefinitely. You will most likely need to seed everything yourself always and forever or it will disappear. [...]

I set it to it, but the html is sub 10kb

> [bats](#comment_70_1QvU5RXqw5mjgR3BZV5rkc2ju6NHXpGnp): Unless they actively delete the file, they will seed it for a while at least. It's possible to pin a file in order to seed indefinitely. You will most likely need to seed everything yourself always and forever or it will disappear. [...]

Not sure if i set it up correctly!

> [bats](#comment_71_1QvU5RXqw5mjgR3BZV5rkc2ju6NHXpGnp): You have 312MB of "other" filetypes in your site, probably the epubs.  [...]

Thank you my friend, checking it out
Looks like that fixed it @bats. Thanks!

> [higgsbozon](#comment_1_193YCP9moB9iMgASvyoy89d8J4YHr51xS1): Where Seeds?

There should be seeds there

1613138654_1BkheWe7wwX2r3HuRQunHFu9jTMtC.body: Good post, but I do not know if the devs are active anymore.
